title: We went to 10 anti-Tesla protests — and a couple counter protests, too
snippets: On March 29th, thousands of protesters demonstrated against Elon Musk and his actions involving DOGE, criticizing his attempts to end humanitarian aid, shut down federal agencies, and dismiss government employees. This event marked the peak of ongoing protests over nearly two months, targeting Tesla's sales and Musk directly.
summary: On March 29th, thousands protested against Elon Musk for his actions related to DOGE, opposing his efforts to halt humanitarian aid, close federal agencies, and lay off government workers. This demonstration, part of ongoing protests for nearly two months, specifically targeted Tesla's sales and Musk personally.

summary: Samsung introduced the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra, a cordless stick vacuum priced at $1,099. It comes with an LCD display control panel that enables users to get phone notifications directly on the vacuum, aiming to solve the problem of missing important alerts during cleaning sessions.
